entity.yoyo.throw.subtitle: Yoyo thrown
entity.yoyo.stick.subtitle: Yoyo sticks
entity.yoyo.chase.subtitle: Yoyo called
enchantment.yoyos.collecting.desc: This enchantment allows yoyos to pick up items.
tooltip.yoyos.sticky: Sticks to blocks and acts like a rope swing.
item.yoyos.book.tooltip: How to become a master thrower\nby Jozufozu
item.yoyos.yoyo.desc: The Yoyo is a ranged melee weapon allowing you to tear your opponents to shreds.\nIt is also a children's toy. Go figure.
stat.axle.name: Axle
stat.body.name: Body
stat.cord.name: Cord
stat.yoyo.duration.name: Duration
stat.body.weight.name: Weight
stat.body.weight.desc: Base value for movement speed calculation.\nFinal value is the sum of all weights.
stat.axle.friction.name: Friction
stat.axle.friction.desc: Value used to calculate how long the yoyo can last.\nIf any part has 0 friction the yoyo can last forever.
stat.cord.length.name: Length
stat.cord.length.desc: How far away the yoyo will get from you.
modifier.extension.name: Extension
modifier.extension.desc: §oSize does matter!§r\nIncreases the length of the cord.
modifier.lubricated.name: Lubricated
modifier.lubricated.desc: §oRuns like dream.§r\nDecreases friction between the parts of the yoyo, lengthening it's duration.
modifier.floating.name: Floating
modifier.floating.desc: §oLook at the little guy!§r\nThe pufferfish acts like a balloon and makes the yoyo lighter.
modifier.gardening.name: Shear
modifier.gardening.desc: §oNo longer safe for children.§r\nCuts down grass and flowers and such. Also sheep. It shears sheep.
modifier.farming.name: Farming
modifier.farming.desc: §oIt ain't much, but it's honest work.§r\nHarvests crops, replanting the seeds. Also tills soil. Basic hoe functionality.
modifier.sticky.name: Sticky
modifier.sticky.desc: §oI... I can't get it off.§r\nSticks to blocks and allows you to reel yourself in.
modifier.gluey.name: Gluey
modifier.gluey.desc: §oSafe, Non-toxic§r\nSticks to blocks and allows you to reel yourself in, at the cost of damage.
modifier.collecting.name: Collecting
gui.error.not_a_yoyo: %s can only be applied to yoyos!
yoyos.lexicon.tagline.mana_yoyo: An iron-tier yoyo that repairs itself with mana
yoyos.lexicon.tagline.elf_yoyo: A manasteel equivilent yoyo with the ability to pick up items
yoyos.lexicon.page.elf_yoyo00:
The &1Elementium Yoyo&0 will pick up any items it touches, returning them to the user when it is reeled in.
Combining the &1Elementium Yoyo&0 with a &1Terra Chaser&0 in a crafting square allows for the latter to also get this power. This can't be undone.
yoyos.lexicon.page.elf_yoyo0:
See &2Elementium Equipment&0.
The &1Elementium Yoyo&0 will pick up any items it touches, returning them to the user when it is reeled in.
Combining the &1Elementium Yoyo&0 with a &1Terra Chaser&0 in a crafting square allows for the latter to also get this power. This can't be undone.
yoyos.lexicon.tagline.terra_chaser: A yoyo that chases after its prey
yoyos.lexicon.page.terra_chaser0:
The &1Terra Chaser&0 is a weaponized toy with great strength given to it by the &1Terrasteel&0 from which it was made. Its power is par to a &1Diamond Yoyo&0, with the added ability to consume &4Mana&0 instead of taking damage.
When directed to with a whistle and the swing of a fist, the thrown yoyo will seek out something to attack. This comes at a small cost of &4Mana&0.
yoyos.lexicon.page.terra_chasere:
Lastly, the tool takes damage for every single block broken, so a good supply of &4Mana&0 in the wielder's inventory is a must for the higher ranks, as the tool does function like normal &1Manasteel Tools&0, in that it'll use &4Mana&0 instead of actually taking damage, given it's made of &1Terrasteel&0.
It also won't despawn like regular dropped items.
